strapiPost.title: Alice Walton Foundation And Washington Regional Partner For Specialty Care In NWA
strapiPost.content:
The Alice L.Walton Foundation and Washington Regional Medical System recently announced their joint initiative to enhance access to specialty care services in the region. 

  • Trio: The partnership with Washington Regional Medical System is in addition to last year’s announcement of The Alice Walton Foundation’s partnership with Cleveland Clinic. The aim of the three organizations is to work together with their unique strengths to bring affordable, high-quality care.
  • Broader scope: Greater specialty care opportunities for NWA through the initiative may include cardiac care, digestive health, neuroscience, oncology, orthopedics/spine, and behavioral health. Alice Walton said the partnership is about ensuring residents have access to world-class care, and a broad scope of it to our region and beyond. 

Learn more HERE.
